div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Dosage|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 ComplexType `Dosage` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. Element `Dosage` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Dosage.sequence` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.sequence`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Dosage.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.text`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Dosage.additionalInstruction` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.additionalInstruction`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Dosage.patientInstruction` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.patientInstruction`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Dosage.timing` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.timing`, but has no comparisons.

Note that the target element context `Dosage.asNeeded[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Dosage`. Element `Dosage.asNeeded` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.asNeeded[x]`, but has no comparisons. Note that the target element context `Dosage.asNeeded[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Dosage`.

Note that the target element context `Dosage.asNeeded[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Dosage`. Element `Dosage.asNeededFor` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.asNeeded[x]`, but has no comparisons. Note that the target element context `Dosage.asNeeded[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Dosage`.
Element `Dosage.site` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.site`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Dosage.route` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.route`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Dosage.method` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.method`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Dosage.doseAndRate` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.doseAndRate`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Dosage.doseAndRate.type` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Dosage.doseAndRate` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Dosage.doseAndRate.type` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.doseAndRate.type`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Dosage.doseAndRate.dose[x]` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Dosage.doseAndRate` requires a cross-version extension. Note that the target element context `Dosage.doseAndRate.dose[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Dosage.doseAndRate`. Element `Dosage.doseAndRate.dose[x]` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.doseAndRate.dose[x]`, but has no comparisons. Note that the target element context `Dosage.doseAndRate.dose[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Dosage.doseAndRate`.

Element `Dosage.doseAndRate.rate[x]` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Dosage.doseAndRate` requires a cross-version extension. Note that the target element context `Dosage.doseAndRate.rate[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Dosage.doseAndRate`. Element `Dosage.doseAndRate.rate[x]` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.doseAndRate.rate[x]`, but has no comparisons. Note that the target element context `Dosage.doseAndRate.rate[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Dosage.doseAndRate`.
Element `Dosage.maxDosePerPeriod` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.maxDosePerPeriod`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Dosage.maxDosePerAdministration` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.maxDosePerAdministration`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Dosage.maxDosePerLifetime` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.maxDosePerLifetime`, but has no comparisons.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
